statements: DELETE FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login Attempt';
DELETE FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_id = 100 AND event_type = 'Login';
DELETE FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND event_description LIKE '%Unauthorized%' AND event_source = 'External';
DELETE FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE id = 10 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM FalseAlarms WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND alarm_type = 'Fire Alarm';
DELETE FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE location = 'Headquarters' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM security_breaches WHERE severity > 5 AND location = 'Office A';
DELETE FROM false_alarms WHERE reason = 'System Glitch' AND date < '2022-01-01';
